definitions.definition: A collar worn by a horse, immediately behind the head, to which a handle, strap, or rope may be attached.
In some styles of horse halter and bridle , an optional part similar to a throatlatch .

main_definition: ( South America ) A collar worn by a horse, immediately behind the head, to which a handle, strap, or rope may be attached.
secondary_definitions: ( Canada , US ) In some styles of horse halter and bridle , an optional part similar to a throatlatch .
